subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The trade of Scott Kazmir to the Tampa Bay Devil Rays for Víctor Zambrano might be the worst deal since the Mets sent Nolan Ryan to the Angels for Jim Fregosi in 1971.
snippet: The trade of Scott Kazmir to the Tampa Bay Devil Rays for Víctor Zambrano might be the worst deal since the Mets sent Nolan Ryan to the Angels for Jim Fregosi in 1971.
